item.title: 10 Dirtiest Hotels list from TripAdvisor
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
10 Dirtiest Hotels in the U.S. 1. Tropicana Resort Hotel, Virginia Beach, Vir. 2. Hotel Carter, New York, N.Y. 3. Days Inn Downtown/Port, Miami, Fla. 4. Budget Inn, Knoxville, Tenn. 5. Red Carpet Inn, Fort Lauderdale, Fla. 6. New York Inn, New York, N.Y. 7. Poindexter Ocean Front Resort, Myrtle Beach, S.C. 8. Days Inn, Lancaster, Penn. 9. Ramada Inn Miami Airport North, Miami, Fla. 10. Sea Club Resort, Fort Lauderdale, Fla.
Read the whole article.
